feature1.title: Remove duplicates
feature1.description: Find and remove duplicates in your playlists and compare two playlists to find common tracks.

feature2.title: Save unclassified tracks
feature2.description: Group all unclassified tracks inside a playlist.

feature3.title: Top tracks playlist
feature3.description: Create a playlist from your current top tracks.

subtitle: View all your playlists, find and remove duplicates, save unclassified tracks and much more.
title: Manage your Spotify playlists
